desc: I'm Abby and I'm 10 years old. I've developed a delicious range of home made mixes for you, your friends and family to enjoy. Made with premium local ingredients, our mixes are delicious and simple to make. My mission is for families and friends to get together in the kitchen, learn, have fun and enjoy time together.

layout.text: My mission is for families and friends to get together in the kitchen to learn, laugh, bake and create.
